title: 143. $15 Florida Minimum Wage Passes | What This Means For Restaurants
description: In this episode of The Barron Report, host Paul Barron sits down with Don Fox, the chief executive officer of Firehouse Subs. Barron and Fox explore what Florida’s new $15 minimum wage will mean for the restaurant industry.
itunes:author: Foodable Network
itunes:subtitle: In this episode of The Barron Report, host Paul Barron sits down with Don Fox, the chief executive officer of Firehouse Subs. Barron and Fox explore what Florida’s new $15 minimum wage will mean for the restaurant industry.
